title: WearBoy (for Android Wear)
summary: Relive your childhood with the fun retro WearBoy Watch Face for Android Wear!
description: Inspired by the classic GameBoy™ handheld, you can relive childhood memories with this fun metro WearBoy Watch Face for Android Wear! 7-in-1--------------WearBoy comes with 7 different styles: WearBoy Classic and WearBoy Color in 6 color variations!Pixel Perfect for any screen-------------Every graphic is rendered for the screen resolution and density - so everything looks sharp and crisp.Instructions-------------After installation, long press your Android Wear homescreen, you'll see a list of available watch faces. Scroll to WearBoy. Use the gear to select which color you'd like for WearBoy Color.Compatible with Android Wear 5.0 on the following watches: Moto360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 & Asus ZenWatch.NOTE: This is not a playable game - it's just a fun retro watch face.Feedback?-------------We'd love to hear what you think! Shoot us an email at info@watchfuldesign.comThis developer is not associated with Nintendo. GameBoy™ is a trademark, registered in numerous countries, owned by Nintendo Co., Ltd.
descriptionHTML:
Inspired by the classic GameBoy™ handheld, you can relive childhood memories with this fun metro WearBoy Watch Face for Android Wear!

7-in-1
--------------
WearBoy comes with 7 different styles: WearBoy Classic and WearBoy Color in 6 color variations!


Pixel Perfect for any screen
-------------
Every graphic is rendered for the screen resolution and density - so everything looks sharp and crisp.


Instructions
-------------
After installation, long press your Android Wear homescreen, you'll see a list of available watch faces. Scroll to WearBoy. Use the gear to select which color you'd like for WearBoy Color.

Compatible with Android Wear 5.0 on the following watches: Moto360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 & Asus ZenWatch.


NOTE: This is not a playable game - it's just a fun retro watch face.


Feedback?
-------------
We'd love to hear what you think! Shoot us an email at info@watchfuldesign.com


This developer is not associated with Nintendo. GameBoy™ is a trademark, registered in numerous countries, owned by Nintendo Co., Ltd.
comments: Cool Please add options to add a small day of month on the gameboy screen as well as not going black and white since that doesn't save battery for everyone.

Great little watch face, especially for the nostalgia factor! But, as others have said, it WOULD BE AWESOME if the buttons would link to your phone apps like pedometer, messaging, etc. Still, great watch face to have!
Fun Would like the date in "Wed 09" format.
Sad Does not work in my sony Smart watch 3
